name: NUM-ITTU STANDOFF ENDS
text:
NUM-ITTU STANDOFF ENDS

Sapphire miners in Num-Ittu Mine recently agreed to end a rebellion originally started for better wages. The mine, owned and operated by the East Empire Company, was a major source of income for it, but the workers never saw much of the profits themselves. According to the foreman of the mine, Linia Trellus, the Company sent in a mercenary known as %PCName from the Fighters Guild to put down the revolt: "I thought they were coming to scare us into backing off, but I guess even sellswords know how to bargain sometimes." Rogatus Cipius, the Factor of the EEC's Narsis branch, had this to say: "The Company cares about its workers' requests. We are negotiators first and foremost, and are careful to seek out peaceful solutions where possible."
